{"adhoc_filters": [], "annotation_layers": [], "bottom_margin": "auto", "color_scheme": "d3Category20b", "comparison_type": "values", "datasource": "4346__table", "extra_form_data": {}, "granularity_sqla": "time", "groupby": [], "label_colors": {}, "left_margin": "auto", "limit": 100, "line_interpolation": "linear", "metrics": [{"aggregate": null, "column": null, "expressionType": "SQL", "hasCustomLabel": true, "isNew": false, "label": "DAU/MAU", "optionName": "metric_lqveb2bepy9_919h6pyj8xt", "sqlExpression": "max(d_users)/max(m_users)"}], "order_desc": true, "rich_tooltip": true, "rolling_type": "None", "row_limit": 1000, "show_brush": "auto", "show_legend": true, "show_markers": true, "time_grain_sqla": "P1D", "time_range": "previous calendar month", "time_range_endpoints": ["inclusive", "exclusive"], "viz_type": "line", "x_axis_format": "smart_date", "x_ticks_layout": "auto", "y_axis_bounds": [null, null], "y_axis_format": "SMART_NUMBER", "remote_id": 9403, "datasource_name": "EV_Stickiness db", "schema": "simulator_20220620", "database_name": "ClickHouse: simulator"}

__SqlaTable__.sql:
select *
from 

(select count(DISTINCT user_id) as d_users, toDate(time) as time
FROM simulator_20220620.feed_actions 
group by time) t1

join 

(select count(DISTINCT user_id) as m_users, toMonth(time) as month
FROM simulator_20220620.feed_actions 
group by month) t2

on toMonth(t1.time) = t2.month
